sys:positions.title: Minister for Culture, Tourism, and Civil Aviation

description: Dip Kumar Upadhaya is a leader of the Nepali Congress party and a politician from Lumbini Province. He has served as Nepal's Minister for Culture, Tourism, and Civil Aviation and as the ambassador to India. He resigned from his ambassadorial post to compete in the 2074 House of Representative election. In the 2008 Constituent Assembly election, he was elected from the Kapilvastu-1 constituency with 12,997 votes.
short_description: Nepali politician, leader of the Nepali Congress, former Minister for Culture, Tourism, and Civil Aviation, and former ambassador of Nepal to India.
